snippet: Army and political leaders in Pakistan have missed a chance to move their country forward.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Pakistan's army and political leaders for continuing to ignore the Obama administration's pleas to crack down on militants who cross from Pakistan to attack American forces in Afghanistan; warns that Pakistan will find it harder to fend off its enemies, both real and perceived, as American troops leave Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Army and political leaders in Pakistan have missed a chance to move their country forward.
